entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
